page.title: 03THE METRO IN N.W.NEWCASTLE.
page.content: The Metro is a type of rail transport running on electricity.The Metro in the Kenton/Fawdon area of the city is served by 4{unmanned stations.}It is hoped that eventually the system will be extended to terminate at Newcastle Airport. The Metro is very{popular with the public who use it to travel to many areas of Tyne and Wear. The trains run at ten minute intervals and they{link up with the local bus {services.}You are not allowed to smoke on the Metro, a ruling of which most people approve. There are two controversial{level crossings without {barriers}where accidents have occurred because motorists have tried to beat the red lights.The trains can't cross their red lights as a device is fitted to the lines which acts as a brake on them.{Video cameras}are to be fitted to combat vandalism.
